basics.name: Blessing Okoro
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: A continuous learner, readily adapting to emerging technologies and a commitment to creating innovative and high-performing web experiences. A collaborative team player with excellent problem-solving and communication skills, dedicated to delivering results that exceed expectations.

work.summary: Brand representative for international luxury brands
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee the website
Drive business innovations, design and build solutions that support it
Automate monotonous business processes and work out automated solutions that increase efficiency and effectiveness, which lowers cost of operation and production.
Successfully implement responsive web design principles, ensuring optimal user experience across various devices, leading to a 30% increase in mobile traffic and improved user engagement
Lead the integration of an e-commerce platform, enhancing online sales functionality and contributing to a 25% increase in online revenue within the first business year
Implement A/B testing methodologies to analyze user behavior and preferences, leading to data-driven optimizations that increased conversion rates by 15%.
Integrate third-party APIs, enhancing the website's functionality and providing users with seamless access to additional features and services.

work.summary: Specialize in creating all things web, web application design and development, content curation and production, mobile app development, social media management, search engine optimization, and internet marketing.
highlights: Troubleshoot software issues on every project worked on
Monitor and maintain website projects, making sure it is squeaky clean, portraying your brand with the highest level of aesthetics and 'digital ergonomics
Collaborated with in senior web developers to build applications for (RisingTide Africa, Sifuse, Laspark) using php and laravel.
Supported the redesigning of underperforming client website, proposed improvements to UI designs and identified solutions to resolve issues with mobile functionality.
Applied version control to test, track and update existing code to ensure the web operated on the latest web technologies.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

Training.title: Computer Science
Training.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

Training.title: Salesforce Administration
Training.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
